mapper.select:
SELECT SCHEDULE_ID, OPERATION_TYPE, NUMBER_OF_PEOPLE, TUTORING_NUMBER, SCHEDULE_START, SCHEDULE_END, CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(SCHEDULE_START,'%H:%i'),'~',DATE_FORMAT(SCHEDULE_END,'%H:%i')) SCHEDULE_TIME, CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(SCHEDULE_START,'%Y년 %m월 %d일'), ' 일정') SCHEDULE_DATE, (SELECT NAME FROM PLAY WHERE PLAY.PLAY_ID = SCHEDULE.PLAY_ID) PLAY_NAME, REG_ID, DATE_FORMAT(REG_DATE, '%Y/%m/%d') REG_DATE, UPD_ID, DATE_FORMAT(UPD_DATE, '%Y/%m/%d') UPD_DATE FROM SCHEDULE
AND STORE_ID = #{storeId}
AND SCHEDULE_START BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{scheduleStart}, '000000'), '%Y%m%d%H%i%S'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AND DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{scheduleStart}, '235959'), '%Y%m%d%H%i%S'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
AND SCHEDULE_END BETWEEN NOW() AND DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{scheduleStart}, '235959'), '%Y%m%d%H%i%S'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
AND SCHEDULE_END BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{scheduleStart}, '000000'), '%Y%m%d%H%i%S'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AND NOW()
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCHEDULE ( OPERATION_TYPE, NUMBER_OF_PEOPLE, TUTORING_NUMBER, SCHEDULE_START, SCHEDULE_END, PLAY_ID, STORE_ID, SUB_TOPIC, REG_ID, REG_DATE ) VALUES ( #{operationType}, #{numberOfPeople}, #{tutoringNumber}, DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(#{scheduleStart}, '%Y%m%d%H%i%S'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S'), DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(#{scheduleStart}, '%Y%m%d%H%i%S'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S'), INTERVAL #{scheduleEnd} MINUTE), #{playId}, #{storeId}, #{subTopic}, #{regId}, NOW() )
